name: Caladea
description: Caladea is a free modern, friendly serif font family based on Cambo , designed by Carolina Giovagnoli and Andrés Torresi for Huerta Tipográfica. Caladea has the following differences: More condensed width New metrics 4 styles. Regular, Bold, Italic, and Bold Italic Character set expanded to WGL (418 glyphs) To contribute, see github.com/huertatipografica/Caladea .
author: Andrés Torresi, Carolina Giovagnoli
